_header: The law of God be to thee thy rest
_description: Exhortation to forsake the world — one 12-line stanza (abababababab)

BLAdd37788.First Lines:
The law of god be to þe thy restThe flesh þy sacrifice
                    þe world exile …
BLAdd37788.Last Lines:
…Haue do gayton fle to this festFor here In of al wynnyng lyth
                    crosse & pile
BLAdd37788.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 291.
Luria,  Maxwell Sidney,  and  Richard L. Hoffman, eds.  
             Middle English Lyrics.
         New York: Norton, 1974: 157.
